resources.string: Yaaic (Yet Another Android IRC Client) is an Internet Relay Chat (IRC) client.

Yaaic (Yet Another Android IRC Client) is an Internet Relay Chat (IRC) client.
Some of the features: * multi-server/channel support * SASL support * Colored text as well as mIRC colors * Smooth channel scrolling / swiping * Message icons * A bunch of commands * Many supported charsets * Colored nicknames * Nick completion (use search button) * Graphical smilies * Scrollback history
Yaaic is open source / free software (GPL).
Official Homepage: http://www.yaaic.org
